Articles.Content:
:sticktongue:HELLOOOOOOWWW

The game Star Citizen has started a contest.

And me and a friend have joined the contest.

What is the goal? To make a space ship.

But that s when you are in the top 16 at the end of the year.

So now we just have to make a weapon for the space craft's.

Here we will be posting our progress and we hope to get feedback.

We are also looking for a 3d texturing artist so if interested contact us.

SO keep on checking out this tread

Info: https://robertsspaceindustries.com/

just a teaser ( this is an engine WIP_test )

(no final just consept/idea)

thanks for your time
